data.text: @AnthonyMRoberto @btharris93 PJW? Being a grifting tool? No! Tell me it isn't true!
@errjustsaying @btharris93 I know that and feel sorry for them, but because they can’t keep it in news here, and thus cake and parties fade away, they are trying in my opinion to keep it relevant.

@btharris93 I mean. It is not exactly original or a "hot take" to say that social media funnels every emerging crisis into an increasingly polarised game of whatabout and doubledown. That doesn't mean it's not true though.
@burmesecatlady @btharris93 Actually Hong Kong is not good … which is a slight concern.
@errjustsaying @btharris93 BBC have resorted to giving us daily cases and deaths in Hong Kong today, how desperate is that?
@btharris93 Not really, many people I know have COVID atm … its still in the news!

It's the sheer hypocrisy of these people that's most grating. They constantly whine about the sheeple effortlessly moving from cause to cause while they... do exactly the same thing. Vaccines, masks, Trudeau etc.
